entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 2 April 2023
